title: One killed, two injured in attack in Ctg
body: A 36-year-old man was stabbed to death and two others were injured in an attack allegedly by his neighbour during a meeting over marriage at Farhadabad under Hathazari in Chattogram on Friday night. The deceased was identified as Rabiul Islam alias Babu, son of Zahur of Musa of the village. Manjur Quader Bhuiya, officer-in-charge of Hathazari police, said that a meeting was arranged at the house of Musa Sawdagor, adjacent to Nazirhat Rail Station around 9:00pm over marriage purpose. During the meeting, Babu had a verbal argument with Jasim, son of Ibrahim, from the same area over a trifling matter. ‘At one stage, Jashim hit Babu with a knife and killed him on the spot,’ added the OC. Later, Emrul Hossain Bachhu, 35, brother of Babu, and his cousin Emon, 21, were injured during the attack when they tried to rescue Babu.
